comments.body: We don't usually call a function for a case like this, just inline the AnimatedCrossFade

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +63,67 @@          child: new Container(
            margin: const EdgeInsets.only(left: 24.0),
            child: _crossFade(
              new Text(value, style: text54),
              new Text(hint, style: text54),
